name: Infotone Communications
overview: Infotone Communications provides solutions for designing, executing, and managing integration. It offers i4210 Coupler, which is architected to execute various integration styles, including ETL, EII, EAI, BPM, SOA, and EDA, as well as offers Infotone Analyst, a graphical tool that enables business analysts, IT analysts, and application domain experts to work collaboratively to define and document the functional and technical specification for an integration processâ€“and to turn that directly to implementation. The company also provides Infotone Admin, an unified console for ongoing coupler management, which enables users to view and manage coupler status, see process execution history, explore logs, view configuration, and install IES firmware updates, as well as provides a control point for deploying new projects and project changes into production, ensuring consistent, and auditable change control. In addition, Infotone provides professional services, which include business analysis, configuration, and validation, as well as education services for architects, business/technical analysts, domain experts, and administrators. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Redwood City, California.

funding_rounds.source_description: Revolutionary No Code" Enterprise Integration Start-Up Secures Funding
